task_description: In app simple sms messenger, Block messages from not stored contacts and add the number 5551234567 to the blocked list.
In app simple sms messenger, Unblock messages from hidden numbers, then add the number 555-123-4567 to the blocked list.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Return to the 'Manage blocked numbers' screen without adding a new blocked number.
In app simple sms messenger, Export the current blocked numbers to a file with the default filename 'Blocked numbers_2025_03_21_09_14_40'.
In app simple sms messenger, Block messages from both hidden numbers and numbers not stored in contacts using the 'Manage blocked numbers' interface.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Block messages from hidden numbers and block messages from not stored contacts.
In app simple sms messenger, Block the number '12345*' to block all calls and messages from numbers matching the pattern in the simple sms messenger application.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Return to the main messaging screen and then send a new SMS message to a contact.
In app simple sms messenger, Allow messages from unsaved contacts by unchecking the box next to 'Block messages from not stored contacts', then add the number 555-123-4567 to the blocked list.
In app simple sms messenger, Export the blocked numbers to a text file named 'Blocked numbers_2025_03_21_09_14_40.txt' and save it to the downloads folder.
In app simple sms messenger, Block the number 5551234567 in the Manage blocked numbers settings.
In app simple sms messenger, Block the number '12345' and then verify that 'Block messages from not stored contacts' is disabled.
In app simple sms messenger, Change the font size to Large within the settings menu and then return to the main messaging screen.
In app simple sms messenger, Disable blocking of messages from not stored contacts and then add a specific number to the blocked list.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Enable blocking of messages from hidden numbers, then add the number '1234567890' to the block list.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Add the number '12345' to the blocked number list in the SMS messenger app, then return to the main settings screen.
In app simple sms messenger, Block the number '1234567890' from sending messages or calling.
In app simple sms messenger, Export the current blocked numbers to a file named 'blocked_numbers.txt' for backup purposes.
In app simple sms messenger, Block messages from both not stored contacts and hidden numbers within the Simple SMS Messenger app.
In app simple sms messenger, Search for the contact 'Mariam Pereira' using the search bar and then open the conversation with them.
In app simple sms messenger, send a message containing the text 'Hello' to the number 555-555-1212.
In app simple sms messenger, open the settings menu and check if there is an option to change the notification sound. If there is, change the notification sound to 'Beep'.
In app simple sms messenger, start a new message, type 'Meeting at 3 PM', add the contact 'John Doe' (if it exists, otherwise just type the number 555-555-3434), and send the message.
In app simple sms messenger, send a new SMS message to a contact in your address book.
In app simple sms messenger, view the details of a received SMS message, including the sender's number and timestamp.
In app simple sms messenger, delete a specific SMS message from a conversation thread.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Send a new SMS message to a specific phone number.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Open a specific message thread and read the latest message.
In app simple sms messenger, Task-Oriented: Delete a specific message thread.
In app simple sms messenger, compose a new message to the number '555-123-4567' with the text 'Hello there!' and send it.
In app simple sms messenger, open the settings menu, navigate to the 'Notifications' section, and disable the 'Show message preview' option.
In app simple sms messenger, search for the contact 'John Doe' in the contact list and then view the details of that contact.
